greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: Square array A(n,k), n>=0, k>=0, read by antidiagonals, where A(n,k) = Sum_{j=0..n} (-k)^(n-j)*Stirling2(n,j).
formula: E.g.f. of column k: exp((1 - exp(-k*x))/k) for k > 0.
A(0,k) = 1 and A(n,k) = Sum_{j=0..n-1} (-k)^(n-1-j) * binomial(n-1,j) * A(j,k) for n > 0.
mathematica: T[n_, k_] := Sum[If[k == n-j == 0, 1, (-k)^(n-j)] * StirlingS2[n, j], {j, 0, n}]; Table[T[k, n - k], {n, 0, 10}, {k, 0, n}] // Flatten (* _Amiram Eldar_, May 07 2021 *)
results.author: _Seiichi Manyama_, Jul 27 2019
